_header: Matter of mourning is thus cloth I-colored with red for our sake
Subjects: sermons, verse in; Virgin Mary, prayers to; Christ, blood of
_description: Prayer to Virgin Mary to ask whether Christ died for our sake, in a sermon, Quare rubrum est indumentum tuum — one long couplet

CULIi38.Transcription:
Mater of murnyng ys þus cloþ y colourd with rede for our
                    sakeMater of lernyng ys þe questioun þat y to hym haue
                    take
CULIi38.Editions:
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “Textologische Probleme mittelenglischen Dichtung.” 
             Mannheimer Berichte
         8 (1974): 245-8: 246.
Stemmler,  Theo. 
             “More English Texts from MS. Cambridge University Library
                Ii.III.8.” 
             Anglia
         93 (1975): 1-16: 11.
